backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining website content types, access-controlled update functions, and user profile storage with admin and user permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder containing no features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing summaries of various frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and custom CSS variables defining a warm color palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting dark mode, metadata, favicon, and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component that loads website content, renders sections, handles login state, and opens the admin editor dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: Displays a destructive alert and message when the editor fails to load.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminEdito: Full editor dialog allowing anonymous content loading, editing, previewing, and saving with error handling and image selection.
frontend/src/components/admin/ChangeEdit: Empty placeholder component file for an edit-password dialog.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity authentication and clearing query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter their name and save their profile with validation and error display.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Heade: Responsive header navigation with site title, section scrolling, editor button, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/sections/Content: Renders a content section with title, body text, and three feature cards.
Displays footer text, a link to caffeine.ai, and a copyright notice using the current year.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with configurable text and image alignment, scroll button, and preview mode handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAccess.ts: Legacy hook returning whether the authenticated caller is an admin along with auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnonymousActor.ts: Provides a memoized anonymous backend actor via React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnonymousWebsiteCo: Fetches and updates website content using an anonymous actor with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of hooks for fetching and mutating website content, user profiles, roles, and admin status via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base layers and defines CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/heroLayout.ts: Provides helpers mapping alignment and position values to Tailwind utility classes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines project state, goals, and pending feature requests for persisting app data across upgrades.
